tool_description: Search, and get app/reviews/news data from store.steampowered.com
name: Steam
title: Steam

api_list.name: Global Achievement Percentages For App
api_list.description: Get the list of all achievements and their percentages success rate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam2.p.rapidapi.com/globalAchievementPercentagesForApp/730"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steam2.p.rapidapi.com/globalAchievementPercentagesForApp/{appid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: App News
api_list.description: Get last n news for App
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam2.p.rapidapi.com/newsForApp/730/limit/10/300"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steam2.p.rapidapi.com/newsForApp/{appid}/limit/{limit}/{contentlength}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: App Reviews
api_list.description: Get last n reviews of an app

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: Reviews are returned in batches max 200 (instead of 20 as in original API), so pass \"*\" for the first set, then the value of \"cursor\" that was returned in the response for the next set, etc. Note that cursor values may contain characters that need to be URLEncoded for use in the query string. As default is \"*\"

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam2.p.rapidapi.com/appReviews/730/limit/40/*"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steam2.p.rapidapi.com/appReviews/{appid}/limit/{limit}/{cursor}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam2.p.rapidapi.com/search/Counter/page/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steam2.p.rapidapi.com/search/{term}/page/{page}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
